All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AbstractGenerator
An abstract class that serves as a base for data generators.
AbstractSortStrategy
AbstractSortStrategy is an abstract class that implements the SortStrategy interface.
ArrayType
Represents the types of arrays based on predefined categories.
ArrayTypeConfiguration
 
ArrayTypeGenerator
Generates arrays of different predefined types with varying levels of disorder.
BubbleSort
 
Button
 
Configuration
Represents a configuration for an experiment, specifying the dataset size, number of arrays, and the generator settings.
ConfigurationReader
Reads and parses a JSON configuration file containing multiple sorting experiment configurations.
ConfigurationsWrapper
A wrapper class for holding a list of sorting experiment configurations.
CustomListCellRenderer
 
Data
Represents a data structure that manages an array and its associated properties.
DataSet
Represents a dataset for sorting visualization and benchmarking.
EntropieConfiguration
 
EntropyGenerator
A generator that creates arrays with a specified entropy level using an external Python script.
Experiment
The Experiment class is responsible for running sorting experiments using different sorting strategies.
GaussienneConfiguration
 
GaussienneGenerator
Generates an array of integers following a Gaussian (normal) distribution.
Generator
 
GeneratorType
Enum representing different types of data generators.
GraphConstructor
The GraphConstructor class is responsible for creating and displaying graphs using the matplotlib4j library.
HeapSort
 
Infos
 
Insertion
 
InterfaceSetting
 
Main
 
Main
 
MainExperimentation
 
MergeSort
 
QuickSort
 
Result
The Result class represents the result of an experiment.
Runner
The Runner class is responsible for executing sorting algorithms on generated datasets.
SettingAlgo
 
SettingGenerator
 
Sonde
The Sonde class is used to track and record various metrics such as the number of comparisons, accesses, swaps, and time taken during an algorithm's execution.
SortAlgorithm
Represents a sorting algorithm that can be executed with a specific strategy, a dataset, and a visualizer for observing the sorting process.
SortStrategy
Interface representing a sorting strategy.
SwapConfiguration
 
SwapGenerator
A generator that creates a nearly sorted array by performing a specified number of swaps.
TimSort
 
Visualizer
The Visualizer class graphically displays an array of integers as bars.
